00018 // the constants defining which column represents what kind of information
00019 static const int NAMECOLUMN = 0;
00020 static const int DIRECTIONCOLUMN = 1;
00021 static const int WIDTHCOLUMN = 2;
00022 static const int LEFTCOLUMN = 3;
00023 static const int RIGHTCOLUMN = 4;
00024 static const int TYPENAMECOLUMN = 5;
00025 static const int TYPEDEFCOLUMN = 6;
00026 static const int DEFAULTCOLUMN = 7;
00027 static const int DESCRIPTIONCOLUMN = 8;

00035 QWidget* PortsDelegate::createEditor( QWidget* parent, 
00036                                                                          const QStyleOptionViewItem&, 
00037                                                                          const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00038         // if the column is the one specified for direction items 
00039         if (index.column() == DIRECTIONCOLUMN) {
00040 
00041                 QComboBox* combo = new QComboBox(parent);
00042                 combo->addItem(QString("in"));
00043                 combo->addItem(QString("out"));
00044                 combo->addItem(QString("inout"));
00045                 combo->addItem(QString("phantom"));
00046                 connect(combo, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(int)),
00047                         this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00048                 return combo;
00049         }
00050 
00051         // if item is for left or right bounds or width
00052         else if (index.column() == LEFTCOLUMN || index.column() == RIGHTCOLUMN ||
00053                 index.column() == WIDTHCOLUMN) {
00054                 QSpinBox* spinBox = new QSpinBox(parent);
00055                 spinBox->setRange(0, 2048);
00056                 spinBox->setSingleStep(1);
00057                 connect(spinBox, SIGNAL(editingFinished()),
00058                         this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00059                 return spinBox;
00060         }
00061 
00062         // if item is for default value
00063         else if (index.column() == DEFAULTCOLUMN) {
00064                 
00065                 QLineEdit* defaultEdit = new QLineEdit(parent);
00066                 connect(defaultEdit, SIGNAL(editingFinished()),
00067                         this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00068                 return defaultEdit;
00069         }
00070 
00071         // if the item is for type name of port
00072         else if (index.column() == TYPENAMECOLUMN) {
00073                 QComboBox* combo = new QComboBox(parent);
00074 
00075                 for (int i = 0; i < VhdlGeneral::VHDL_TYPE_COUNT; ++i) {
00076                         combo->addItem(VhdlGeneral::VHDL_TYPES[i]);
00077                 }
00078                 combo->setEditable(true);
00079                 combo->setSizeAdjustPolicy(QComboBox::AdjustToContents);
00080 
00081                 connect(combo, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(int)),
00082                         this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00083                 return combo;
00084         }
00085 
00086         // if the item is for type definition of type name
00087         else if (index.column() == TYPEDEFCOLUMN) {
00088                 QComboBox* combo = new QComboBox(parent);
00089 
00090                 for (int i = 0;i < VhdlGeneral::VHDL_TYPEDEF_COUNT; ++i) {
00091                         combo->addItem(VhdlGeneral::VHDL_TYPE_DEFINITIONS[i]);
00092                 }
00093                 combo->setEditable(true);
00094                 combo->setSizeAdjustPolicy(QComboBox::AdjustToContents);
00095 
00096                 connect(combo, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(int)),
00097                         this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00098                 return combo;
00099         }
00100 
00101         // if column was for the name, type or description column
00102         else {
00103 
00104                 // use line edit to edit all other columns
00105                 QLineEdit* editor = new QLineEdit(parent);
00106                 connect(editor, SIGNAL(editingFinished()),
00107                         this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00108                 return editor;
00109         }
00110 }

00112 void PortsDelegate::setEditorData( QWidget* editor, 
00113                                                                   const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00114         // if the column is the one specified for direction
00115         if (index.column() == DIRECTIONCOLUMN) {
00116 
00117                 QString text = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00118                 QComboBox* combo = qobject_cast<QComboBox*>(editor);
00119 
00120                 int comboIndex = combo->findText(text);
00121                 combo->setCurrentIndex(comboIndex);
00122         }
00123 
00124         // if item is for left or right bounds or width
00125         else if (index.column() == LEFTCOLUMN || index.column() == RIGHTCOLUMN ||
00126                 index.column() == WIDTHCOLUMN) {
00127 
00128                 QSpinBox* spinBox = qobject_cast<QSpinBox*>(editor);
00129                 int value = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toInt();
00130                 spinBox->setValue(value);
00131         }
00132 
00133         // if item is for default value
00134         else if (index.column() == DEFAULTCOLUMN) {
00135 
00136                 QLineEdit* defaultEdit = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(editor);
00137                 QString value = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00138                 defaultEdit->setText(value);
00139         }
00140 
00141         // if the item is for type name of port
00142         else if (index.column() == TYPENAMECOLUMN) {
00143                 
00144                 QString text = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00145                 QComboBox* combo = qobject_cast<QComboBox*>(editor);
00146 
00147                 int comboIndex = combo->findText(text);
00148                 // if the text is not found
00149                 if (comboIndex < 0) {
00150                         combo->setEditText(text);
00151                 }
00152                 // if the text was found
00153                 else {
00154                         combo->setCurrentIndex(comboIndex);
00155                 }
00156 
00157         }
00158 
00159         // if the item is for type definition of type name
00160         else if (index.column() == TYPEDEFCOLUMN) {
00161                 QString text = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00162                 QComboBox* combo = qobject_cast<QComboBox*>(editor);
00163 
00164                 int comboIndex = combo->findText(text);
00165                 // if the text is not found
00166                 if (comboIndex < 0) {
00167                         combo->setEditText(text);
00168                 }
00169                 // if the text was found
00170                 else {
00171                         combo->setCurrentIndex(comboIndex);
00172                 }
00173         }
00174 
00175         // if column was for name, type or description column
00176         else {
00177                 // use the line edit for other columns
00178                 QString text = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00179                 QLineEdit* lineEdit = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(editor);
00180                 lineEdit->setText(text);
00181         }
00182 }

00184 void PortsDelegate::setModelData( QWidget* editor, 
00185                                                                  QAbstractItemModel* model, 
00186                                                                  const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00187         // if the column is the one specified for direction
00188         if (index.column() == DIRECTIONCOLUMN) {
00189 
00190                 QComboBox* combo = qobject_cast<QComboBox*>(editor);
00191                 QString text = combo->currentText();
00192                 model->setData(index, text, Qt::EditRole);
00193         }
00194 
00195         // if item is for left or right bounds or width
00196         else if (index.column() == LEFTCOLUMN || index.column() == RIGHTCOLUMN ||
00197                 index.column() == WIDTHCOLUMN) {
00198                 
00199                 QSpinBox* spinBox = qobject_cast<QSpinBox*>(editor);
00200                 int value = spinBox->value();
00201                 model->setData(index, value, Qt::EditRole);
00202         }
00203 
00204         // if item is for default value
00205         else if (index.column() == DEFAULTCOLUMN) {
00206 
00207                 QLineEdit* defaultEdit = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(editor);
00208                 QString value = defaultEdit->text();
00209                 model->setData(index, value, Qt::EditRole);
00210         }
00211 
00212         // if the item is for type name of port
00213         else if (index.column() == TYPENAMECOLUMN) {
00214                 QComboBox* combo = qobject_cast<QComboBox*>(editor);
00215                 QString text = combo->currentText();
00216                 model->setData(index, text, Qt::EditRole);
00217         }
00218 
00219         // if the item is for type definition of type name
00220         else if (index.column() == TYPEDEFCOLUMN) {
00221                 QComboBox* combo = qobject_cast<QComboBox*>(editor);
00222                 QString text = combo->currentText();
00223                 model->setData(index, text, Qt::EditRole);
00224         }
00225 
00226         // if column was for name, type or description
00227         else {
00228                 // get the text from line edit for other columns
00229                 QLineEdit* lineEdit = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(editor);
00230                 QString text = lineEdit->text();
00231                 model->setData(index, text, Qt::EditRole);
00232         }
00233 }
00234 
00235 void PortsDelegate::commitAndCloseEditor() {
00236 
00237         // try to get pointer to editor in both cases
00238         QComboBox* combo = qobject_cast<QComboBox*>(sender());
00239         QLineEdit* lineEdit = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(sender());
00240         QSpinBox* spinBox = qobject_cast<QSpinBox*>(sender());
00241 
00242         // if the editor was combo box
00243         if (combo) {
00244                 emit commitData(combo);
00245                 emit closeEditor(combo);
00246         }
00247 
00248         // if the editor was spinBox
00249         else if (spinBox) {
00250                 emit commitData(spinBox);
00251                 emit closeEditor(spinBox);
00252         }
00253 
00254         // if editor was line edit
00255         else {
00256                 emit commitData(lineEdit);
00257                 emit closeEditor(lineEdit);
00258         }
00259 }
